quotes.text: If you salute your work , you do not have to salute anybody , if you pollute your work , you have to salute everybody
quotes.author: A p j abdul kalam

quotes.text: A lift of joy and happiness is possible only on the basis of knowledge and science
quotes.author: Dr sarvepalli radhakrishnan

quotes.text: The best way to predict a future is to create it
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: The gift of knowledge is the highest gift in the world
quotes.author: Swami Vivekanandha

quotes.text: Confidence and hard work is the best medicine to kill the disease called failure, it will make your successful person
quotes.author: - apj abdul kalam

quotes.text: When educating the minds of our youth, we must not forget to educate their hearts
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Got may never know what results come of your actions but if you do nothing, there will be no results
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Success is a vehicle which moves on the wheel named hard work and fuel called self confidence
quotes.author: Dr apj abdul kalam

quotes.text: Every man who has become great owes gya achievement to incessant toil
quotes.author: sir n Visvesvaraya

quotes.text: One whose knowledge is confined to book and whose wealth is the possession of others can use neither his knowledge nor wealth when the need for them arises
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text: Education is the manifestation of perfection present already in man
quotes.author: Swami vivekananda

quotes.text: Teaching is a very noble profession that shapes the character caliber and future of an individual. If the people remember me as a good teacher , that will be the biggest honor for me
quotes.author: Dr apj abdul kalam

quotes.text: We are what we think . All that we are arises with our thoughts . With our thoughts, we make the world
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: An engineer is a person who applies the skill and knowledge of basic science for the good of society
quotes.author: Sir m Visvesvaraya

quotes.text: The highest education is the which does not give merely information but makes our life in harmony with all existence
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.text: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Freedom is not worth having if it doesn't include the freedom to make mistakes
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Never lose heart while pressing the path id trust live a principled life
quotes.author: Basavanna

quotes.text: I am the master of my failure, if i never fail how will I ever learn?
quotes.author: C v raman

quotes.text: Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence
quotes.author: - Robert Frost

quotes.text: Intelligence plus character - that is the goal of true education
quotes.author: - martin luther king

quotes.text: To succeed in your mission you must have a single minded devotion to your goal
quotes.author: - dr a p j abdul kalam

quotes.text: A man is great by his deed not by birth
quotes.author: - Chanakya

quotes.text: Your mind is a powerful thing . When you filter it with positive thoughts , your life will start to change
quotes.author: - gauthama buddha

quotes.text: Try not to became a man of success but rather try to become a man of value
quotes.author: - dr a p j abdul kalam

quotes.text: Climbing to the top demands strength whether it is to the top of Mount Everest or to the top of your career
quotes.author: - dr a p j abdul kalam

quotes.text: By education i mean an allround drawing of the best in child and man in body mind and spirit
quotes.author: - mahatma gandhi

quotes.text: In learning you will teach and in teaching you will learn
quotes.author: - phil collins

quotes.text: Have more than you show , speak less than you know
quotes.author: - william shakespeare

quotes.text: We are what we repeatedly do . Excellence then is not an act but a habit
quotes.author: - aristotle

quotes.text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follow
quotes.author: - steve jobs

quotes.text: Imagination is the foundation of all invention and innovation
quotes.author: - jk Rowling

quotes.text: Mirror is my best friend because when i cry it never laughs
quotes.author: - charlie chaplin

quotes.text: The beautiful things about learning is that no one take it away from you
quotes.author: - b b king

quotes.text: Computer are able to see hear and learn welcome to the future
quotes.author: - dave waters

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams
quotes.author: - Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Education is not the learning of facts it's rather the training if the mind to think
quotes.author: - albert einstein

quotes.text: Arise awake and stop not until the goal is reached
quotes.author: - swami vivekananda

quotes.text: To give real service, you must add something which cannot be brought or measured with money
quotes.author: Sir m Visvesvaraya

quotes.text: Try not to become just a nab if success but rather try to become A man of value
quotes.author: Albert einstein

quotes.text: Manpower without any unity it is harmonised and United properly then united properly then it becomes a spiritual power
quotes.author: Sardar vallabhbhai patel

quotes.text: Stay hungry stay foolish

quotes.text: When you stand above the crowd you must be ready to have stones thrown at you
quotes.author: Vikram Sarabhai

quotes.text: Your brand is what other people say about it when your not in the room

quotes.text: If you want to walk fast walk alone. But if you want to walk far walk together
quotes.author: Ratan tata
